Gather food: Look for edible plants, fruits, and nuts to sustain yourself. You can also try fishing or hunting for small animals if available.
Build a shelter: Create a shelter using available materials, such as leaves, branches, and rocks. This will provide protection from the elements and help regulate body temperature.
Start a fire: Use flammable materials like dry leaves, twigs, and bark to start a fire. This will not only provide warmth but also help signal for rescue.
Signal for help: Use the fire or any other available resources to signal for help. You can also try to make noise to attract attention from passing boats or planes.
Learn survival skills: Study the local flora and fauna to understand how to survive in the island's environment. Learn how to forage, hunt, and fish, and how to identify edible plants.
